PerfectNetExp.abs: 浪字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 浪费〖 waste;lavish;squanderspand;〗 浪花〖 spray;spindrift〗 浪迹〖 travellingfoot-loose〗.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... spindly 纺锤形的 spindrift 飞沫 spine 脊骨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (originally Scots): variant of spoondrift, from archaic spoon 'run before wind or sea' + the noun drift

means.word_mean: 1. spray blown up from the surface of the sea

auth_sentence.content: I'll...look at the Spindrift...I'm having her overhauled and fitted out for a cruise.
